The beginning. This album is good. Feel this is the beginning of the end. You can tell 
this album is professionally produced. I have loved them since the first 
time I say them on the sing off. But this feels like the sell out album. 
Which is great for them but it's not just the 5 of them. The use of extra 
sound effects (reverbs and such). It's not the roots they came from and 
makes me a little disappointed. Still good and worth supporting them. Just 
feel this is the beginning of the end of 5 talented people making pure 
acapella music.

A Must Buy! I am just going to tell you that this is an EXCELLENT and AMAZING album! 
You must buy it and here are three points why: 1. It is Pentatonix! 2. It 
is acapella (which is amazing)! And 3. It is a lot of original work! There 
are three reasons and should you need more then you need to just buy it 
instead of over thinking it. This purchase will make you very happy, trust 
me I know from experience.

CANT GET ENOUGH!!!!! I've been waiting for this for a LONG time now and its everything I 
thought it would be and more!!! I just bought it today and I've played it 
through 4 times. Something about their music (covers included) strikes some 
deep, great feeling, emotions that I can resonate to this album with. I 
have been a lifetime fan since PTX Vol. 2. If you want something different 
and still phenomenal, PTX is the way to go!

Absolutely perfect in every way! Looked forward to this release for months, 
once it got here I started playing and haven't stopped. I can listen to 
Pentatonix all day every day and never get tired of them. They are such a 
ridiculously talented group. Scott, I love the rasp in your voice in Sing! 
Also, Kevin, can I just say....wow, loved your part too. Mitch, you're 
always spot on and fantastic and wonderful and..and..I could go on forever. 
Kirsty, Water is SO good! It's a perfect showcase of your voice. Avi, what 
can I say sir, Light in the Hallway is stunning. I love these guys so so so 
much! Can't wait for them to come back to DFW!

PTX in top form Over the 17 tracks there is only one that I don't absolutely love. It's 
not a perfect album but it is still fantastic! It's amazing what PTX had 
accomplished for music and a cappella. Can't sleep love and sing are 
fantastic singles, and light in the hallway is something I will be singing 
in my head constantly. This was definitely worth the wait!
